name: Tocen
description: What is the project about? Tocen is an one-stop, aggregated platform for Gamefi – Defi – NFTfi. We are building simplified, easy to use dApps & addictive games on Sui Network with a vision of onboarding millions of newcomers to Web3. What makes your project unique? Tocen is an all-in-one platform, whose the mission is to be easy-to-use for billions users. History of your project. Tocen had run IDO & INO on Sui Network. Funds from IDO: 705,000 $SUI What’s next for your project? Tocen team planned to finalize the Game Hub, Dex Aggregator on Q2 & we are looking forwards to CEX listing. What can your token be used for? $TOCE is the core governance token of Tocen launchpad and other non-launchpad products. The token use cases are bootstrapping DAO rights, elevating the benefits of Master Key NFTs, participating in exclusive token/NFT sales, earning with staking rewards and more.
